name: Mimic Arena
description: Fight alongside your past selves in this techno bullet hell arena. You must master the arts of jump, shoot, and repeat if you wish to stand a chance. Jump off walls to avoid the onslaught of bullets heading your way. Shoot an assortment of weapons that blanket the battlefield in brightly colored destruction.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 800 MB available space

reviews.review_text: I'm a sucker for local multiplayer games, and we loved this one! Weird enough to be labelled with Nidhogg and Samurai Gunn, we'll definitely pull it out again. Great concept!  ...Also, give us more maps. My only major con.
